title: Github Enterprise link
longDescription:
[Whitewater GitHub Enterprise](https://whitewater.ibm.com/tools/github) is provided to internal IBM teams in order to promote and enable social coding at IBM.

**Note:** You must [register](https://github.ibm.com/) at Whitewater GitHub Enterprise before you add this integration. All users with [access to this toolchain](https://console.ng.bluemix.net/docs/services/ContinuousDelivery/toolchains_using.html#managing_access) will be able to access artifacts derived from this repository, such as build artifacts in the Delivery Pipeline

existing_repo_url.title: Existing Git Repository
existing_repo_url.description: This is the repository from where the source code will be imported.

private_repo.title: Private Repository
private_repo.description: Select this check box to create a private repository.

has_issues.title: Enable GitHub Enterprise Issues
has_issues.description: Enable GitHub Enterprise Issues page for lightweight issue tracking.

migrateTAndP.title: Migrate Track & Plan work items to GitHub Enterprise Issues
migrateTAndP.description: Track & Plan work items will be created as GitHub Enterprise issues in your new repository. Choose 'Yes' if you want to migrate.

labels.title: GitHub Enterprise issues use labels to track attributes. Select which work item attributes to map to labels in your new GitHub Enterprise issues

enable_traceability.title: Track deployment of code changes
enable_traceability.description: Select this check box to track the deployment of code changes by creating tags, labels and comments on commits, pull requests and referenced issues. If you want to enable later, you can right-click on the Git repo card in the Toolchain page and click Configure.

form.title: Track & Plan Migration
form.description: Details for setting up the migration of your Track & Plan Work Items.

items.title:
Your new toolchain uses GitHub Enterprise Issues for issue tracking. 

To keep your Track & Plan data, you must transfer it to GitHub Enterprise Issues now. [Learn more](https://console.ng.bluemix.net/docs/services/ContinuousDelivery/upgrade_projects.html#start_upgrade).
By default, all of your work items are migrated. If you want to migrate only specific items, specify a [Track & Plan query]({{rtcSharedQueriesLink}}).
items.description: Work Items will be selected based on this Query (from Shared Queries). If Query is not specified, all work items are selected.
Track & Plan data will not be migrated.
